bibl.title: Letter from Rupert Blue to Laura Armistead Carter, October 1, 1925

div1.p: Blue expresses his condolences for the death of Henry Carter.

div1.head: Letter from Rupert Blue to Laura Armistead Carter, October 1, 1925

opener.dateline:
Los Angeles, Calif.
1015 East 8th Street,
October 1, 1925.

div1.p:
The Bureau has just announced the passing
of your distinguished father Dr. Henry R. Carter.
As you know, I was personally devoted to Dr. Carter
from the beginning of my service career in 1893. His
worth as a man, and his scientific achievements as
an officer of the Public Health Service, has been
recognized and appreciated not only by the officers
of his own corps but by the scientific world as well.

May I express to you, and through you to
Henry and Edward, my deep sympathy in the loss of
your devoted father.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Rupert Blue, Miss Laura Carter,
Westmoreland Apartments,
2122 California Street,
Washington, D.C.
